name: UNION 002 : THE WIRES
description:
Part of TRILOGY - a conversation between 3 collections, BINARY, SPECTRUM, and UNION. Autobiographical abstraction. 

UNION pieces are what happens when BINARY and SPECTRUM pieces collide and break apart, providing a more playful canvas for the colour blocks to dance amidst the white squares and find oblique representations of the story they're expressing.

THE WIRES
---------------------
Behind the physical world
is a world of wires.
A liquid switchboard
that connects every thing
to everything else.
Each wire vibrates
with a different colour,
which describes the
strength of the bond
between each node. 
I once asked The Wires 
about you but they just laughed. 
I asked why, and they told me: 
'Yes, you have an important bond 
but really, to us, it's like asking 
if your toe ever thinks about your
earlobe. In the end, it doesn't 
really matter - you're both 
part of the same
body'.
